elements.name: question3
elements.title: How can ambiguities be resolved during a telephone conversation?
elements.correctAnswer: by asking specific questions and summarizing

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the advantage of summarizing information in text form?
elements.correctAnswer: The information can be viewed several times.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What is the rule for sentences in written summaries?
elements.correctAnswer: They must be brief and complete.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What rule applies to information in written summaries?
elements.correctAnswer: They must be truthful and factually correct.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: What does the Q stand for in the SQ3R method?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What does the second R stand for in the SQ3R method?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What are the three phases of the 3-phase reading method?
elements.correctAnswer: 1. gain an overview 2. grasp the topic 3. recognize core information
